education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology

education.institution: Durgawati Hemraj Tah Saraswati Vidya Mandir

experience.title: Frontend Developer
description: Built responsive and visually striking websites utilizing ReactJS, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript, optimizing the organization's web platform for enhanced functionality and user engagement. Leveraged modern front-end technologies to ensure consistent, high-quality experiences across various devices and screen sizes.

Designed UI/UX prototypes and implemented them in the frontend using ReactJS and Tailwind CSS. Collaborated with backend developers to seamlessly integrate these components with APIs, optimizing data flow and ensuring consistent performance across the platform.

experience.title: Open Source Contributor
description: Contributed to Hacktoberfest 2023, Successfully completing 4+ pull requests to diverse open-source projects on GitHub, demonstrating strong command of Git version control and GitHub processes.
Engaged with a global community of developers to address issues, contribute to discussions, and improve project features, enriching my understanding of collaborative software development.

certifications.name: DOEACC/NIELIT 'O' Level Certification
certifications.issuer: National Institute of Electronics and Information Technology
